Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have a few tiny suggestions about ksp.

1. docking

the clamp-o-trons need to be renamed from "Docking port" to "Docking unit" since docking 2 ports together just seems wrong.

also, size 3 docking ports, for kerbodine rocket bodies.

2. textures and models

I'm sorry, but the new tier 1 and 2 buildings look a bit horrid.

Can't squad use the sheds pictured in the preview?

3. other things

KSP needs active texture management as stock, so that more people will consider buying ksp, since the lag on older systems will be decreced.

Those are my suggestions.

thanks.

1. Whats wrong with docking 2 ports and NASA call docking ports, docking ports.

but 3.75m docking ports would be great

2. They cant use the barn and sheds cause they weren't good enough and bac9 criticised it. This is rumored to come back as tier 1 in a later update.

3. You'd have to have a choice to activate this but it doesn't decrease lag it reduces the amount of RAM used by mods and wouldn't help with stock.

sorry mate but these will probably not be seen by squad and lately no suggestions have been seen by squad staff.
